alert.note: Alert for Central Interior Cumberland; Coastal Cumberland; Coastal York; Interior York (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 28 at 3:42AM EDT until July 28 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heat index values in the mid 90s expected. * WHERE...Portions of southwest Maine. Portions of central and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 8 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Warm overnight temperatures in the 60s and 70s have provided little relief to the ongoing warm pattern. This can add to daytime heat stress.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.
